pageContext.claim: “The average Minnesotan has seen an annual income gain of more than $1,700 since my election. ”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear where Trump is getting his data. There's no annual data for 2018 income in Minnesota yet. Even so between 2016 and 2017, real median household income grew by roughly $200 — not $1700. A local television station rated this claim as false, saying average income in Minnesota has risen every year for ten years.
